forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle veil of clouds graces the sky, holding the promise of a mild night ahead. The temperature hovers around 53 degrees, and a soft breeze whispers through the streets, offering a refreshing embrace as the southwest wind dances lightly at 6 to 13 mph. The air is clear enough to make the twinkling city lights glimmer below, although the marine layer may still linger in the distance, casting its mysterious charm over the horizon.

Tomorrow dawns with the sun breaking through, ushering in a day filled with warmth and clarity. Expect a pleasant high near 68 degrees, with the afternoon cooling slightly as a south-southwest wind picks up pace, creating a comfortable ambiance ideal for outdoor pursuits. As the city awakens, those venturing out might find themselves dwarfed by sweeping views of the Golden Gate Bridge, adorned against the sunlit canvas of sky. In light of these moderate temperatures and welcoming conditions, layering is recommended—a light jacket or cardigan in the morning will transition seamlessly into a short-sleeved shirt as the sun climbs higher. Embrace the day with a stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet visit to one of the local cafes, both of which are perfect invitations to savor the San Francisco charm as its dynamic beauty unfolds in the warm embrace of summer.
